data.content:
Hey, welcome to <:discohook:736648398081622016> **Discohook**! The easiest way to personalise your Discord server.

There's more info below, but you don't have to read it. If you're ready press **Clear All** in the top of the editor to get started.

Discohook has a [support server](https://discohook.app/discord), if you need help feel free to join in and ask questions, suggest features, or just chat with the community.

We also have [complementary bot](https://discohook.app/bot) that may help out, featuring reaction roles and other utilities.
_ _

embeds.title: What's this about?
embeds.description:
Discohook is a free tool that allows you to personalise your server to make your server stand out from the crowd. The main way it does this is using [webhooks](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/228383668), which allows services like Discohook to send any messages with embeds to your server.

To get started with sending messages, you need a webhook URL, you can get one via the "Integrations" tab in your server's settings. If you're having issues creating a webhook, [the bot](https://discohook.app/bot) can help you create one for you.

Keep in mind that Discohook can't do automation yet, it only sends messages when you tell it to. If you are looking for an automatic feed or custom commands this isn't the right tool for you.

embeds.title: Discord bot
embeds.description:
Discohook has a bot as well, it's not strictly required to send messages it may be helpful to have it ready.

Below is a small but incomplete overview of what the bot can do for you.

fields.name: Getting special formatting for mentions, channels, and emoji
fields.value:
The **/format** command of the bot can give you special formatting for use in Discord messages that lets you create mentions, tag channels, or use emoji ready to paste into the editor!

There are [manual ways](https://discord.dev/reference#message-formatting) of doing this, but it's very error prone. The bot will make sure you'll always get the right formatting for your needs.

fields.name: Creating reaction roles
fields.value:
You can manage reaction roles with the bot using the **/reaction-role** command.

The set-up process is very intuitive: type out **/reaction-role create**, paste a message link, select an emoji, and pick a role. Hit enter and you're done, your members can now react to any of your messages to pick their roles.

fields.name: Recover Discohook messages from your server
fields.value:
It can also restore any message sent in your Discord server for you via the apps menu.

To get started, right-click or long-press on any message in your server, press on apps, and then press **Restore to Discohook**. It'll send you a link that leads to the editor page containing the message you selected!

fields.name: Other features
fields.value: Discohook can also grab images from profile pictures or emoji, manage your webhooks, and more. Invite the bot and use **/help** to learn about all the bot offers!

data.content:
🚗 **Welcome to Carverse!**

Your ultimate companion for everything about cars. Explore, customize, and enhance your driving experience! Ready to start? Dive in by pressing **Clear All** and begin your journey. Need assistance? Join our [support community](https://carverse.app/discord) or check out our [Carverse bot](https://carverse.app/bot) for exciting features.

embeds.title: 🏎️ What is Carverse?
embeds.description:
Carverse is your go-to platform for car enthusiasts, offering tools and insights to help you personalize, maintain, and explore the world of automobiles. Whether you’re a seasoned driver or a curious learner, we’ve got you covered!

🚦 *Note*: Carverse is designed for hands-on enthusiasts—automation features are limited.

fields.name: 🚘 Why Choose Carverse?
fields.value:
✔ Discover the latest car trends
✔ Access maintenance tips and guides
✔ Share your car journey with a vibrant community

embeds.title: 🤖 Meet the Carverse Bot
embeds.description: Bring the road to life with our feature-packed bot! Designed to complement Carverse, the bot offers tools to enhance your car knowledge and interactions.

fields.name: 🛠️ Maintenance Reminders
fields.value: Use **/set-reminder** to track important car maintenance dates like oil changes or tire rotations.

fields.name: 🏁 Compare Cars
fields.value: Easily compare car models and features using **/compare-cars** to find your perfect match!

fields.name: 🚗 Log Your Rides
fields.value: Keep a record of your drives with **/log-ride**, including distance, time, and fuel usage.

fields.name: 📂 Additional Features
fields.value: Explore car facts, get recommendations, and more. Use **/help** to unlock the full potential of the bot!
